name: Hebden Rising
tagline: Information to coordinate Hebden Bridge and the Upper Calder Valley
body:
[Flood Warnings for Hebden Bridge](https://flood-warning-information.service.gov.uk/warnings?location=Hebden+Bridge)

Here are the Environment Agency [river levels for Hebden Bridge](https://flood-warning-information.service.gov.uk/riverlevels?location=Hebden%20Bridge). These are more up-to-date than other sources of information.

Individual stations:

Calder at:

* [Todmorden](https://flood-warning-information.service.gov.uk/station/8205)
* [Callis](https://flood-warning-information.service.gov.uk/station/8343)
* [Hebden Bridge](https://flood-warning-information.service.gov.uk/station/8097)
* [Mytholmroyd](https://flood-warning-information.service.gov.uk/station/8048)

Tributaries:

* [Nutclough](https://flood-warning-information.service.gov.uk/station/8152)



GOV.UK site to [check risk of flooding](https://www.gov.uk/check-if-youre-at-risk-of-flooding).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
